QuestData.Title: Expression of Gratitude
QuestData.Description: I know just the job for an eager newcomer! We've got a gnoll problem. You might even call it a gnoll infestation! Pesky things. They keep creeping up more and more, and now they're on our doorstep, stealing our parts! Inconceivable.$B$BIt all begins and ends with their uppity leader, Gnarlhide. I want you to see to that "ends" part. Go pay him a visit at his camp all the way to the west, in Snowblind Hills.$B$BAnd when I say "pay him a visit," that's a euphemism for "kill him painfully." Kay? Kay!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ricket at K3 wants you to kill Gnarlhide.
QuestData.CompletionText: I like Ricket cause she's sooo delicious!$B$BOh, hey there again! How goes the pest control?
